00001 #include <cmath>
00002 #include <cstring>

00004 using namespace std;
00005 
00006 /*
00007  * RNDM function is taken from CERNLIB/kernlib to make
00008  * possible results comparision. It generate exactly the same
00009  * sequence of numbers as original.
00010  *
00011  * C adoptation: A. Zhelezov
00012  */
00013 float rndm(int iseed){
00014   #define MSK1 0x0c000000
00015   #define MSK2 0x33000000
00016   static int MCGN=12345;
00017 
00018   MCGN=MCGN*69069;
00019   union {
00020     float AMAN;
00021     int   MANT;
00022   } u;
00023 
00024   u.MANT=(MCGN>>8)&0x00ffffff;
00025   
00026   if(u.MANT){
00027     u.AMAN=(float)u.MANT;
00028     u.MANT-=MSK1;
00029   } else 
00030     u.MANT=MSK2;
00031   return u.AMAN;
00032 }
00033 
00034 /*
00035  * CPP equivalant for CERNLIB/GENLIB function EISRS1
00036  *
00037  * Translated by A.Zhelezov, DESY/ITEP, 2007
00038  * NOTE: tested with 3x3 matrix only!
00039  */
00040 
00041 void TRED2(int NM,int N,float *A,float *D,float *E,float *Z){
00042   // A(NM,N),D(N),E(N),Z(NM,N)
00043   ::memcpy(Z,A,sizeof(*A)*(N*NM));
00044 
00045   for(int II=1;II<N;II++){
00046     int I = N - II;
00047     int L = I - 1;
00048     float H = 0.;
00049     float SCALE = 0.;
00050     if(L > 0) {
00051       for(int K=0;K<I;K++)
00052         SCALE += ::fabs( Z[I*N+K] ); // Z[I][K]
00053     }
00054     if(SCALE == 0.){
00055       E[I] = Z[I*N+L];
00056       D[I] = H;
00057       continue;
00058     }
00059     for(int K=0;K<I;K++){
00060       Z[I*N+K] /= SCALE;
00061       H+=Z[I*N+K]*Z[I*N+K];
00062     }
00063     float F = Z[I*N+L]; // Z[I][L]
00064     float G = (F>=0.)?-::sqrt(H) : ::sqrt(H);
00065     E[I] = SCALE * G;
00066     H -= F * G;
00067     Z[I*N+L] = F - G;
00068     F = 0.;
00069     for(int J=0;J<I;J++){
00070       Z[J*N+I]=Z[I*N+J] / (SCALE*H);
00071       G = 0.;
00072       for(int K=0;K<=J;K++)
00073         G += Z[J*N+K] * Z[I*N+K];
00074       for(int K=J+1;K<I;K++)
00075         G += Z[K*N+J] * Z[I*N+K];
00076       E[J] = G / H;
00077       F += E[J] * Z[I*N+J];
00078     }
00079     float HH = F / (H + H);
00080     for(int J=0;J<I;J++){
00081       F = Z[I*N+J];
00082       G = E[J] - HH * F;
00083       E[J] = G;
00084       for(int K=0;K<=J;K++)
00085         Z[J*N+K] = Z[J*N+K] - F * E[K] - G * Z[I*N+K];
00086     }
00087     for(int K=0;K<I;K++)
00088       Z[I*N+K] *= SCALE;
00089     D[I] = H;
00090   }
00091   D[0] = E[0] = 0.;
00092   for(int I=0;I<N;I++){
00093     if(D[I] != 0.) {
00094       for(int J=0;J<I;J++){
00095         float G=0.;
00096         for(int K=0;K<I;K++)
00097           G+=Z[I*N+K]*Z[K*N+J];
00098         for(int K=0;K<I;K++)
00099           Z[K*N+J] -= G*Z[K*N+I];
00100       }
00101     }
00102     D[I] = Z[I*N+I];
00103     Z[I*N+I] = 1.;
00104     for(int J=0;J<I;J++){
00105       Z[I*N+J] = 0.;
00106       Z[J*N+I] = 0.;
00107     }
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00111 void TQL2(int NM,int N,float *D,float *E,float *Z,int &IERR){
00112   // D(N),E(N),Z(NM,N)
00113   float MACHEP=::pow(2.,-23);
00114   IERR = 0;
00115   if (N == 1)
00116     return;
00117   for(int I=1;I<N;I++)
00118     E[I-1] = E[I];
00119   float F = 0.;
00120   float B = 0.;
00121   E[N-1] = 0.;
00122   for(int L=0;L<N;L++){
00123     int J = 0;
00124     float H = MACHEP * (::fabs(D[L]) + ::fabs(E[L]));
00125     if(B < H)
00126       B = H;
00127     int M;
00128     for(M=L;M<N;M++)
00129       if(::fabs(E[M])<=B)
00130         break;
00131     if(M==N)
00132       M--;
00133     if(M != L) {
00134       do {
00135         if(J == 30){
00136           IERR=L;
00137           return;
00138         }
00139         J++;
00140         float P = (D[L+1] - D[L]) / (2.0 * E[L]);
00141         float R = ::sqrt(P*P+1.0);
00142         H = D[L] - E[L] / (P + (P>=0?R:-R));
00143         for(int I=L;I<N;I++)
00144           D[I] -= H;
00145         F += H;
00146         P = D[M];
00147         float C = 1.0;
00148         float S = 0.0;
00149         int MML = M - L;
00150         for(int II=0;II<MML;II++){
00151           int I = M - II - 1;
00152           float G = C * E[I];
00153           H = C * P;
00154           if(::fabs(P) >= ::fabs(E[I])){
00155             C = E[I] / P;
00156             R = ::sqrt(C*C+1.);
00157             E[I+1] = S * P * R;
00158             S = C / R;
00159             C = 1.0 / R;
00160           } else {
00161             C = P / E[I];
00162             R = ::sqrt(C*C+1.0);
00163             E[I+1] = S * E[I] * R;
00164             S = 1.0 / R;
00165             C = C * S;
00166           }
00167           P = C * D[I] - S * G;
00168           D[I+1] = H + S * (C * G + S * D[I]);
00169           for(int K=0;K<N;K++){
00170             H = Z[K*N+I+1];
00171             Z[K*N+I+1] = S * Z[K*N+I] + C * H;
00172             Z[K*N+I] = C * Z[K*N+I] - S * H;
00173           }
00174         }
00175         E[L] = S * P;
00176         D[L] = C * P;
00177       } while(::fabs(E[L]) > B);
00178     }
00179     D[L] += F;
00180   }
00181   for(int II=1;II<N;II++){
00182     int I = II - 1;
00183     int K = I;
00184     float P = D[I];
00185     for(int J=II;J<N;J++){
00186       if(D[J] >= P)
00187         continue;
00188       K = J;
00189       P = D[J];
00190     }
00191     if(K==I)
00192       continue;
00193     D[K] = D[I];
00194     D[I] = P;
00195     for(int J=0;J<N;J++){
00196       P = Z[J*N+I];
00197       Z[J*N+I] = Z[J*N+K];
00198       Z[J*N+K] = P;
00199     }
00200   }
00201 }
00202 
00203 void EISRS1(int NM,int N,float *AR,float *WR,float *ZR,int &IERR,float *WORK){
00204   // ALL EIGENVALUES AND CORRESPONDING EIGENVECTORS OF A REAL
00205   // SYMMETRIC MATRIX
00206   // AR(NM,NM),WR(N),ZR(NM,NM),WORK(1)
00207   TRED2(NM,N,AR,WR,WORK,ZR);
00208   TQL2(NM,N,WR,WORK,ZR,IERR);
00209 }
